snippet: Representative Bob Turner, a popular figure in Republican circles whose district faces likely elimination, joins several others wanting the party's nomination to take on the incumbent, Kirsten E. Gillibrand.
abstract: Representative Bob Turner, a popular figure in Republican circles whose district faces likely elimination, joins several others wanting the party's nomination to take on the incumbent, Kirsten E. Gillibrand.

headline.main: His District Likely to Be Cut, Congressman Eyes Gillibrand's Senate Seat
headline.print_headline: His District Likely to Be Cut, Congressman Eyes Senate
